title: Everglades National Park: In The Media
body: In The Media          WPBT2 recently filmed Untold Stories: Everglades National Park. The video features Everglades NP education staff and students from Dr. Gilbert L. Porter Elementary School.  Watch Untold Stories: Everglades National Park      WPBT2's Into the Wild: An Everglades National Park Adventure follows the Roberts family from Homestead on a weekend camping trip in the Park.  Watch Into the Wild                 td>         Filmed over the course of more than six years, The National Parks: America's Best Idea, a new film by Ken Burns, is available from PBS. The accompanying website includes a section for educators.    Learn More About America's Best Idea
